title: QVU_SPARC-Fits: Rotation-curve fitting under the QVCSR/Qvion framework
description: Open-source Python package and scripts for fitting galaxy rotation curves in the SPARC database using the Quantum-Vacuum Composite Stiffness Response (QVCSR) framework. Includes full pipeline for batch fitting, plotting, and residual analysis used in the QVU papers.
notes: First archival release supporting the QVU rotation-curve analysis. All figures and fits in the accompanying paper are reproducible using this repository.
